channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10641] Configurable Bucket Sizes in bucketCache
item.description: In the current implementation of BucketCache, the sizes of buckets created for different blocksizes is fixed. Given that the all the blocksizes will not be used, it would be good to have the bucketCache configurable. The block sizes for which buckets need to be created and the size of the buckets for each block size should be configurable.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The SlabCache provides this kind of functionality. It should be simple enough to recreate that logic with new configuration points.

+1

Minor, use Preconditions#checkArgument instead of assert in BucketAllocator#reconfigure? This shouldn't be called often so why not check this whether asserts are enabled or not.
